table.name: Calim Desert Encounters
table.caption: Calim Desert Encounters
rows: The party spots an oasis out of their way. However, the oasis is a mirage.
An {@creature Ankheg|XMM} lair is buried in the sand nearby.
Light rain falls. Overnight, the desert blooms with rare flora potentially useful in crafting magic items or working high magic.
{@dice 1d6} {@creature Gnoll Warrior|XMM|Gnoll Warriors} riding {@creature Giant Hyena|XMM|Giant Hyenas} seek prisoners.
A Calim sandstorm is coming! (See "{@book Environmental Effects|FRAiF|4|Environmental Effects}" earlier in this chapter.)
{@dice 3d6} {@creature Bandit|XMM|Bandits}, led by a {@creature Bandit Captain|XMM}, rob any travelers they meet. They ride {@creature Camel|XMM|Camels}.
A {@creature Druid|XMM} leads {@b {@dice 2d6}} {@creature Scout|XMM|Scouts} on a pilgrimage.
The party stumbles on the corpses of {@b {@dice 1d4}} unfortunate travelers. The desiccated corpses rise as {@creature Mummy|XMM|Mummies} when night falls.
The party spots the crest of a {@creature Bulette|XMM} as the creature hunts for prey.
An oasis surrounded by detailed sculptures has a masked attendant who's a {@creature Medusa|XMM}.
The party spots a temple to a deity such as Chauntea, Ilmater, or Selûne. Long abandoned, it's protected by a {@creature Guardian Naga|XMM}.

A Cult of the Dragon expedition including a {@creature Mage|XMM}, a {@creature Death Cultist|XMM}, and {@b {@dice 2d4}} {@creature Cultist|XMM|Cultists} are traveling to a far-off {@creature Ancient Blue Dragon|XMM} who wants to become a {@creature dracolich|XMM}.
A caravan bound for the nearest settlement wants to hire the party for protection.
{@dice 2d4} Kochar ({@creature Scout|XMM|Scouts}) make temporary camp. They are peaceful and exchange news.
Scattered bones hint at a hidden treasure vault—it's home to a {@creature Sphinx of Secrets|XMM} that ambushes trespassers.
A wandering {@creature Archmage|XMM} seeks forgotten lore.
An {@creature Efreeti|XMM} and its attendants, an {@creature Elemental Cultist|XMM} and {@b {@dice 2d4}} {@creature Cultist|XMM|Cultists}, camp nearby.
The party wanders into the ruins of an ancient city swallowed by the desert. It is now the lair of an {@creature Ancient Blue Dragon|XMM}.
The exoskeleton of a long-dead purple worm has become a temporary shelter for {@b {@dice 2d6}} {@creature Commoner|XMM|Commoners}.
The city of {@book Miziltep|FRAiF|4|Miziltep} flies by in the distance.
